name: Lose a Letter Lexicon Ladder Pt 11 Quiz | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
Here's a playing tip - If you can't solve the first clue go to one of the others that you can solve, and then work up and down from there.
First word of eight letters -

Absolute rulers, kings and queens

Now drop one letter from the previous answer and rearrange the remaining letters to make the new word of seven letters-

Used to keep vessels in place

Third word of six letters -

Fruits of oak tree

Fourth word of five letters -

Academy Award

Fifth word of four letters -

Glide through the air

A new word of six letters -

Scandinavian country

Second word of five letters -

Thick, compact

Third word of four letters - 

Require or want

Fourth word of three letters -

Bring to a conclusion

Fifth word of two letters -

Nebraska by post
